Class LineChecker

java.lang.Object
  LineChecker

public class LineChecker
extends java.lang.Object

A class to determine if a given string can be examined for data.

Method Detail

statusOfLine

public static int statusOfLine(java.lang.String fileString)
Returns the status of the given string.

Parameters:
fileString - a string from the file.
Returns:
the status, in the form of an integer.
Possible statuses:
- Is valid; can be analyzed for data.
- Does not contain the required number of tokens.
- Ratings at the end of the string are not integers.
- Is part of the string set to be ignored.

validRating

public static boolean validRating(java.lang.String[] fileToken)
Checks if every rating in the given array is an integer.

Parameters:
fileToken - the array that contains the ratings.
Returns:
true if every rating is an integer, false otherwise.
